hero.title: We travel first. We introduce you to the right people next.

about.title: Why
about.subtitle: Reinventing travel by putting the right people in your path.
about.paragraph1: It all started over mint tea in Marrakech, in an alley only locals know. That day, we realized the best travel moments aren't found in brochures. They're born from authentic encounters with those who truly live the territory.
about.paragraph2: The TRIPERS team travels first for you. We explore destinations, meet guides, test experiences. Then we become your travel architects: we find accommodations that fit your budget and desires, we design coherent itineraries, we select activities that make sense. Nothing is standardized, everything is tailored for you.
about.paragraph3Content: To only introduce you to guides we personally know. No anonymous platform, no cold algorithm. Just humans sharing their territory with authenticity and passion. You contact us on WhatsApp, we build together, and on D-day, your guide awaits you on site.
about.card1Content: Prioritize quality encounters over quantity of visited sites. Experience trips built for you, not standardized tours where 40 people follow the same program. Take time to understand a place through those who truly live there.
about.card2Content: We only refer guides we personally know. We've met them, tested them, validated them. Their integrity, knowledge of the terrain, and welcoming manner are our only criteria. No random profile found online.
about.card3Content: Every euro spent directly benefits guides and their communities. No anonymous intermediary capturing value, just a direct and fair link between you and the people showing you their territory.

destinations.title: Our destinations
destinations.subtitle: Tailor-made trips to 4 destinations. Each itinerary is built with you, according to your desires and duration.

maroc.name: Morocco
maroc.description: Immersion in Marrakech souks, nights in the desert, Atlas treks. Ideal for a first trip outside Europe. From 5 days (long weekend) to 2 weeks (complete immersion).

capVert.name: Cape Verde
capVert.description: Sal, Santo Antão... 100% local vibe, music, breathtaking hikes, wild beaches. Perfect for nature lovers and island authenticity. 7 to 12 days.

caraibes.name: Caribbean
caraibes.description: Martinique, Guadeloupe, secret beaches, Creole culture, rum and absolute relaxation. Ideal for combining sea and cultural discovery. 5 to 10 days.

colombie.name: Colombia
colombie.description: Cartagena, Medellín, Rosario Islands, street food, total diversity. For those who love strong contrasts: Caribbean coast, colonial cities, coffee mountains. 8 to 16 days.

map.title: Explore the map
map.description: Each marker corresponds to a place where TRIPERS has spent time, met trusted guides. These aren't theoretical destinations: they're people we've met, traveled with, and whom we then introduce to you.

contact.title: Let's talk about your next trip
contact.description: Have a destination in mind? Dates? An approximate budget? Contact us directly on WhatsApp. We'll ask you a few questions about your desires (nature, culture, food, pace), then we'll build your tailor-made trip with our local guides.

footer.tagline: Live the adventure like a local
footer.whatsappDesc: Everything goes through WhatsApp for direct contact

destinationPage.ctaTitle: Want to build your trip here?
